biotools.summary: TagDust, a program identifying artifactual sequences in large sequencing runs. Given a user-defined cutoff for the false discovery rate (FDR), TagDust identifies all reads explainable by combinations and partial matches to known sequences used during library preparation.

bioschemas.name: TagDust
